Card - Class in spring.flashcard.model
The Card class represents a flashcard containing word, translation, and category information.

The CardController class acts as a controller for handling HTTP requests related to flashcards.

CardRepository - Interface in spring.flashcard.repository
The CardRepository interface extends the JpaRepository interface and defines custom query methods for accessing and managing flashcard data in the database.
